product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Quad Rear Camera Setup: 64MP Main (f/1.79 Aperture) + 8MP Ultra-wide and Marco Lens + 2MP Depth Sensor + 2MP B&W Lens, Eye Tracking, Picture Modes: Super Night Mode, Professional Mode, Document Mode, Bokeh, Beauty, Panorama, AR Animoji, 17 Auto Scene Detection Modes, 8 Pre Loaded Filters, Video Modes: 4K video recording (30fps), Slo-mo Video, Time Lapse, Video Bokeh, Video Beauty, Ultra Steady, Ultra wide Video, Short Video with Effects and 8 Pre Loaded Filters
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 16MP AI Front Camera (f/2.0 Aperture), Front Camera Modes: Super Night Mode, AI CAM and 8 Pre-Loaded Filters, Portrait, Beauty, WideSelfie, AR Animoji, Video Modes: 4K Video Recording (at 30fps), Video Bokeh, Video Beauty, Ultra Steady, Short Video with Effects and 8 Pre-Loaded Filters
product_specification.Flash: Rear - Quad LED Flash | Front - Dual LED Flash
product_specification.Video Recording Resolution: Front and Rear Camera: 4K Video Recording (at 30 fps)
product_specification.Sensors: Fingerprint Sensor, Ambient Light Sensor, G-Sensor, Proximity Sensor, Gyroscope, E-Compass
product_specification.Other Features: DAR-LINK Game Boost Technology, Power Marathon Tech, Secure Card, Video Assistant, Ultra Touch, Thunderback, Xhide, Theft Alert, Peek Proof, Kids Mode, Xclone, Photo Compressor, 360 Flashlight, Social Turbo, Wi-Fi Share, Smart Gestures, Digital Wellbeing, Dark Theme, Eye Care, Multi-Window, Bike Mode, Game Mode, Smart Panel, AI Gallery, 33W Fast Charger, Face and Side Mounted Fingerprint Unlock, Elegant Design
product_specification.Audio Formats: AAC, AAC+, AAC+ Enhanced, OGG Vorbis, WAV, MP3, Midi
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Handset and 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.FHD+ Cinematic Screen: The Infinix Note 10 Pro features an immersive 17.65 cm (6.95) FHD+ Punch Hole display with narrow bezels and an optimal aspect ratio to give you an expansive view of the screen. Its large screen-to-body ratio provides you with easy edge-to-edge access to the display. And, you can enjoy durable usage with NEG Dinorex T2X-1 glass protection.
product_description.90Hz Ultra Smooth Display: This mobile phone has a 90Hz refresh rate that makes your scrolling experience ultra-smooth. Its 180Hz touch sampling rate ensures faster screen response so that you can maintain your professional status while gaming. Your eyes will also stay comfortable while using the phone as it is TUV Rheinland Certified for low blue light emission.
product_description.64 MP AI Quad Rear Camera: This mobile phone is equipped with a 64 MP AI Quad Rear Camera with a 64 MP Primary lens (f1.79 large aperture), 8 MP Ultra Wide Angle (120 degrees) and Macro lens (2.5 cm) + 2 MP Depth Sensor + 2 MP B&W Lens along with Quad-LED Flash. This ensures that you get to take professional-grade photos. It comes with added features, such as 10x digital zoom and eye-tracking, Super Night mode, Time Lapse video, Slow motion video, Professional mode, Ultra steady mode, and 4K Bokeh Video recording and short video.
product_description.16 MP In-display Selfie Camera: This mobile phone has a 16 MP in-display selfie camera with a dedicated Dual LED flash so that you can take eye-catching selfies. You can use the Video Beauty mode to beautify your selfies. 4K video recording, ultra steady mode, AI Portrait, Super Night Mode, and more are other features that you can use to enhance your videos and photos.
product_description.Powerful Battery with a 33 W Charger: Thanks to the 5000 mAh battery and 33 W Type-C fast charger and Power Marathon Tech, you can enjoy long-lasting usage, fast charging, and increased battery backup. You can also enjoy long hours of 4G talk-time, music playback, video playback, Web surfing, gaming, and much more.
product_description.Helio G95 Octa-core Processor: This mobile phone has a Helio G95 Octa-core processor with 12nm FinFET, 2.05 GHz CPU frequency and Mediatek Hyper EngineGame Technology. Thanks to DAR-LINK Game Boost Technology, you can enjoy powerful gaming that’s free of screen tearing/stuttering. You can enjoy the benefits of its responsive touch panel, enhanced colour reproduction, and no heating issues, even after extended hours of gaming. The 3-in-1 card slot can be used to expand its memory.
product_description.Aesthetic Design: This mobile phone features a premium design that includes a rectangular camera module lens, giving it a more elegant appeal. Its 3D glass-finish back makes it resistant to smudges and fingerprints.
product_description.Dual Speakers with DTS: Equipped with dual speakers that feature DTS-HD surround sound, this mobile phone provides a rich cinematic sound experience. You can use its different modes to suit video, music, and gaming requirements.
product_description.Fast and Secure Phone Unlocking: This mobile phone has a side-mounted multi-functional fingerprint sensor that can be used to unlock the device, dismiss alarms, and accept calls. You can sync your favourite apps to different fingers so that you can get them running in a jiffy. You can also use the face unlock feature to unlock your device swiftly and securely.
product_description.Android 11: This mobile phone offers a fast, secure, and immersive software experience with XOS 7.6 powered by the Android 11 operating system. It brings you innovative features, such as Ultra touch, Thunderback, Secure Card, Theft Alert, Xhide, Xclone, Video Assistant, Wi-Fi share, Kids Mode, Game Zone, Smart Panel, Smart Gestures, Photo Compressor, Social Turbo, Peek Proof, 360 Flashlight, and much more.

Nice phone. Worth every penny. Very fast and smooth. Nice display.
It is fully loaded for a budget smart phone. Anything you can do with a premium smartphone is possible with this phone.

Best phone in these segment considering price & so much durability & strong so it is worth purchase. The combination of 8+256 GB is rare at this price segment with Full HD display of 6.95" & with hidden flash for front camera is a surprise for person who clicks it.

Awesome phone
Performance is next level , I have not faced any lag when doing multitasking , 8GB ram is great advantage.
It's processor is very much optimised so we can play heavy graphics games smoothly
And 256 internal memory is enough to store a lot of things, I think almost all other phones in this price range has only 128 gb memory
Camera is also worth for that price.
Battery backup is great ..for normal usage it can go up to 3 days and that is more than I expected.

One thing I have noticed is when we watch hd contents it's colour production is not that much good . expect this I am very much satisfied by this purchase.

After going through various reviews i ordered this phone by prepaid. Received the mobile from Flipkart on 2nd July 21. Thanks for one day in advance delivery. This is my first infinix mobile.This is my 3rd day usage only. At the outset this mobile looks somewhat premium though plastic built-up. Somany inbuilt useful features. Thanks to Infinix. Regarding display it is big like tablet but due to its height easy to hold and use. But display brightness is low even in indoor when compared to redmi, mi, realme, samsung, techno mobiles which I have used and using now. For comfortable sharp viewing brightness should be put in full. I feel in daylight display visibility is almost not up to mark. I hope infinix will definitely improve screen brightness by immediate software updates. Cameras back and front are ok for normal photography. If it is improved by software updates then this note 10 pro is one of the best in this segment. Regarding ram management it requires lot of improvements. Though it is 8 gb ram, around 3 gb only available almost all the time. 256 GB storage is the highlight. So definitely there will be no chance for storage shortage. Even if we want more space then we can use dedicated sd card. Screen refresh rate also good so far. Fingerprint, face unlock are fast enough. Next i feel battery management should improve. I am not a heavy user. But battery is draining very fast. Within 5 hours of normal usage 50 percent of battery drained. For the past 3 days i am charging this phone twice a day. Speakers are sounding well and audible. This is also good part of this mobile. In general frequent software updates are essential for any kind or brand mobiles. Infinix should also provide software updates then and there. Out of the box this mobile i am having now updated till March 2021 only. I hope that infinix will definitely sort out (1) battery draining, (2)screen brightness, (3)cameras performance, (4)better ram management atleast up to 6 gb out of 8 gb ram etc.issues by OTA updates. This review is strictly on my personal opinion and usage of my infinix note 10 pro. Thanks.

I have used this phone for almost two months now. The pros and cons of this phone are as under:
Pros
1. Battery life: It lasts for an entire day. It takes just 90 minutes to charge to full battery. I used to carry my charger to work everyday, and now I don't.

2. Camera in day light: Camera in day light is very detailed, and captures high quality images.

3. Processor: Even though it is a 4G device, the processor is very efficient and fast. Doesn't lag at all and it great for users like me who don't play heavy games much.

4. Storage and RAM: The cheapest phone with 256gb storage and 8gb RAM. It really makes a difference in the performance of the phone and it is a great thing to have.

5. Volume: The volume on the phone is adequate. You can hear it loud and clear.

6. Connectivity: No 5G here. However, the voice quality for calls was fine.

7. Other random premium features: You can use flash while on videocall and many others. They are great.

Cons

1. Display: It is indeed too dark. You won't enjoy movies on it much, especially movies with dark lighting. You won't be able to see the details at all. In fact its darkness is the reason I am giving it 3 stars. It cannot be improved by any software update also.

2. Camera at night: It is just ok. Nothing special. Images can be blurry.

3. Weight: It is a large phone and you will most certainly feel it in your pocket at all times. It's screen is huge too.
